Class DialogHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • jspecview.common.DialogHelper

  • public class DialogHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    just a class I made to separate the construction of the AnnotationDialogs from their use
    Author:
    Bob Hanson hansonr@stolaf.edu
